content: Not bad, unless you want to sort the results of anything you might be looking for, then this app sucks! You can get hundres to thousands of results from a search, but when you try to sort the results by price (lowest to highest, or highest to lowest) all the sudden you're given only a handfull of results, if you're lucky! I know filtering is supposed to reduce the number of results, but not sorting. Makes this app pretty much useless unless you want to buy what Amazon tells/wants you to buy.

Dear Android developers working on the "filter" feature: the feature is a downgrade since the last update. Too many clicks are required to apply multiple filters. The screen switches far too many times. For those working on the frontend, its gorgeous as per usual! Even with the multiple clicks. Backend: page transitions are a bit slow (as far as that filter feature). Perhaps I over-filter, but I would love for the Search and Discovery (perhaps) team to return this feature to pre-update version.

It used to be a great app then...they changed it. The search results used to be scrollable vertically now you have a few results and then you have to click to the next page. This is a pain especially if you are trying to compare products on two or more pages of said results. Also if you do search and change the way it is sorted mysteriously some or most of the items disappear from the results. There also seems to be more ads for sponsored products in the newest version of the app.

It's okay. this app used to function really well for me, but lately, it hangs and crashes frequently. I makes it frustrating and hard to browse products. It's like every time they add a feature, the app gets clunkier. I don't need Alexa support on the app. What I DO need is for the app to find things fast, load them quickly, and let me compare my choices easily.

The app was great before this last update. Now the sorting removes items from your results therefore forcing you to waste time seeing things that don't match what you are looking for. This is a total disaster. To make matters worse it only allows you to select one filter option at a time so you have to go back and repeat the same steps multiple times just to select things like size, category, dept. etc.

Amazon App went from being a VERY useful app to I'd rather remove it, including my PRIME Membership; - Added page-by-page results, really? - drag-and-drop to wishlist no longer available - App crashes and/or freezes constantly, I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 9, don't blame it on the device! - Once you go back to your search results, it sends you to the beginning, this is a pain! - Item(s) price is misleading, shows a price and after clicked, that price wasn't even an option anymore AND MUCH MORE!

Ive been using this app for years and its slowly got worse. Adding an item to your wish list, you can drag it down into your wish list bar. But your wishlist bar only appears randomly! Deleting an item from your wish list, forget a quick response. It will WAIT, and sometimes FORGET to delete it. The app search doesnt search ALL items in store. I was after a watch. I only found it, because Bing found it first. Giving it 2 stars due to quick purchasing. I have a nokia 6, withupdated os and app.

I was forced to quit using the Underground App & had to move to the Amazon Shopping one. OK, fine. But then they "upgraded" the app & now it's HORRIBLE! The search repeatedly shows me mostly discontinued items, & there's no way to drill down to eliminate things that I don't want to see. I will be uninstalling the app & switching to the web version.

When adding items to a specific wish list, the app is adding the item to two lists. This is very frustrating, because then I have to go and remove each item dividually that was added to the wrong list. Please fix this issue. Also, a few days ago, an Amazon courier delivered my packages to a completely different address. I responded to the "How do you like this photo" question stating that the location WAS NOT my home. Luckily I was in the area and was able to locate my packages. Get it together.

I love shopping on Amazon, but the new update is extremely difficult to use. I don't want to view a few items per page. I prefer scrolling all the way down. I also don't like the new feature that it only allows me to filter one item at a time before showing me the results. It takes much longer, and I sometimes give up. I think Amazon may lose money. Go back to the previous version please!

This app has NEVER crashed on me before this stupid "gift" update. Now if I search by price, I get about a dozen swipes and the screen twitches hard then goes white and reboots. Also, searches are getting worse. If I specify department or price, it should ONLY reduce the selection number, but now, it only increases by thousands, or I get three. Not even possible.

the apps layout is easy to Navigate but very glitchy, items in my list often go into different ones, the app crashes very often or freezes then goes back to a previously looked at items, sometimes the screen is very sensitive and it opens up everything while scrolling or wont even open stuff at all, the list at the bottom randomly switches causing me to drag items into the wrong list or the list i want will not open up instead loadings for a minute then going back to the previously open list. :)

The most recent update is inconvenient. Applying multiple filters for searches is troublesome as you must manually go back now to utilize more than 1 at a time. Limiting the amount of product on each screen and having a "Next Page" feature now is annoying. I have given up on websites that use this method. Not a fan of this update, may delete app after years of use if improvements aren't made or an older version available.

The most annoying thing for me is that I will have 2000 results and when I sort my results by anything other than featured, I only get 50 - 100 results. With this latest update, it closes the filter menu every time you pick a filter and not only that, it does it slowly. My amazon shopping is going to decrease as a result of the app becoming so frustrating. This is just for the app not Amazon.

There is a learning curve with the products on here and I strongly urge anyone to read at least some reviews. Many products are either poorly made or as the case is with many clothes, from china. Sizes are different there and they rip you off with returns. Also take the time to fully read a product's description to save you the hassle of returning later. My biggest gripe is with deliveries. My specific instructions on where to put packages is only followed by the usps,out of common sense.

Amazon is a very large company that has a very big problem with letting you keep your money. Two times in the last month I have been charged for Amazon prime without even accessing my account or any type of Amazon service. I highly advise using Visa cards with this app as one version of the membership is $120 billed without request, and personally I like to make the decision to spend my own money, not have an algorithm strip it from my bank account.

The new update is awful and misleading. When you search for items it'll show you the lowest price but when you click on items it gives you a huge price range, you have to choose from the set of items they've collected as similar and these items are out of stock or sold by scam sellers. Sorting by prime eligible doesn't help because the initial list will show prime eligible items but once you click on something the list you get is made up of random sellers. Amazon needs a more trustworthy set up.

Souq has more choices of goods. Since it was changed to amazon, It seems that Im using a different online shopping platform. The things I used to see on Souq cannot find it anymore in Amazon. One more thing, it displays items which when you want to purchase it says delivery unavailable in your country???. I started using their competition which has now more choices or items than before.

The app is fine...except for one very annoying issue. The app is supposed to display your chosen list on the bottom, and allow you to long press on item photos and slide them into the selected list. This would be great if it wasn't completely buggy. The app frequently and randomly changes the list displayed at the bottom...and many times will show an empty space. This makes using the lists and comparative shopping a headache. This has been a problem for a while. PLEASE FIX IT AMAZON.

1-you can't change how you see the items you search for: it's predetermined to put it in squares and two per line. 2- when i tried to change the display mode (witch there is nothing to customize in the settings option ) I got on the most annoying menu bar ever created: every time i needed to go back to select another option i took you back not to the previous menu, but to the main menu. 3- It's scrolling is very sensitive, it takes you to an item that you obviously didn't want to select

Please fix your app. I'm tired of being ejected from a really detailed review I spent a lot of time on just because you can't seem to recover from the Pixel 3's onboard camera app when I want to snap a picture of the item. Don't just ship it broken. Remove the option if it isn't freaking working right or add a clause in your logic to save the freaking review if the user backgrounds your app. Good ux programming is not hard, guys.

Used to be a good app, probably a 4 out of 5. That was, however, until the latest update, which it looks like took away the "upcoming deals" element of the deals page. This still works on the desktop (and mobile) website. Why have you deemed it necessary to take this away? It certainly hasn't been an improvement to the app. Also, come on, work on the sluggishness when scrolling through long lists of items It is starting to get annoying.

Most of the features i liked about using Amazon to shop have changed. If you sort by low price most of the items are no longer viewable. I used to look up an item sort low to high then scroll through the hundreds of options for what i was looking for at the lowest price. Now I will get a random sampling of only a few items (maybe 20 or so) that start low and go high. Most of the mid priced itms are not even viewable in the low to high filter. I like Amazon but hate this app.

The app used to be preferable to the website, but recent updates have removed the "what customers bought after viewing this item" section which I found incredibly useful for comparisons. Sorting by anything other than "featured" removes most of the search results. Poor experience via the app. Amazon prices have been creeping up for a while, but with my prime membership I preferred the convenience. My prime has now expired, and the app is a frustration to use, so there isn't much to keep me.

App is easy to use. Very descriptive and includes specs of objects. Customer service is 50% unhelpful and or just plain rude. Product delivery tends to be inaccurate. Package is marked as delivered, but many times, it hasn't been delivered yet. this tends to be an issue when there are important packages that get delayed during crucial times.

Amazon has a bad search filter. It puts its sponsored and suggested objects first and makes it near impossible to find something you're look for if it is specific. The different filters they provide are not usually helpful and when you choose to sort by a different requirement then it takes away most of your options. I believe that this could benefit from better filtration system when searching.

so I downloaded it a couple of months ago & I kept getting this message that said amazon assistant has stopped (I think part of that feature is when you can tap a product, then drop it at the bottom of your screen like a save for later) & that's big for me. so I hope it gets better now that I updated it. other than that I love amazon

Was not bad until they added the drag and drop to wish list feature. The app is impossible to use. All I do is scroll and bam, dragging and dropping items. Not holding down any more than 1/4 second. Now my list is full of junk and Amazon thinks I like the stuff so decides to recommend it. The app was inconvenient enough to use already and is now useless. No option to disable it either, only hide. Goodbye Amazon App, and maybe Amazon altogether. #shoplocal

I bought one computer part and it keeps popping up with notifications of deals on the same type of computer part. Like, guys I already got it, that's not how shopping interests work. Now notifications are off. Is my stuff at my front door? I'll have to check like it like I've time travelled into the distant passed of before the smart phone. Other than that the apps works just like the website. I prefer to shop on a computer anyway though because it's much easier to look at multiple things.

I have Prime, and that's the best thing about Amazon. However, this app is kind of terrible. If you like to browse, add stuff to lists for future purchasing, it crashes after a few minutes. The floating default list adds stuff from other lists to itself, and most of my time is spent removing those items bc they don't belong in that list. Then the list disappears, won't allow new things to be added, then the app crashes.

please fix the list tray! I have been using this app for years. it wasn't until the latest update that I started having trouble with the list tray on the bottom of the app. it constantly switches my list so when I try to add an item to it it's going on the incorrect list. it's very annoying it needs to be fixed ASAP

There's something wrong with this app. As soon as any page loads, it quickly turns to an error page saying "uh oh something went wrong on our end". This app has become literally unusable. I've tried deleting it and reinstalling it and still the same thing. Before this started happening it was great. Please fix asap!

Amazon experience is quick and easy, and the app is handy. However each time I open the app it keeps telling me the version of the app is no longer supported and I have to update, which brings me here and it's already the latest version. Although only a minor inconvenience, its just frustrating.

I downloaded this app because Amazon was offering $10 if you switched. I was never credited, and when I chatted with customer service, first they said they would credit me $5, then after I balked they offered me the $10. WHICH THEY AGAIN NEVER CREDITED ME. I'm super disappointed with their shady tactics and how customer service has apparently gone by the wayside.

App doesn't work on my OnePlus 7 Pro. Nothing loads on the home screen, and then several minutes later, a picture of a dog and an error message saying "uh oh something went wrong, please try again" pops up. no matter how many times I try again, so doesn't load. I've tried uninstalling and re-installing to no avail

This app is super convenient to use, but please bring back the opportunity to have everything sent through Smile. Now, I have to add things to my cart, then remember to go out to my browser and get into Amazon Smile and checkout from there. I placed a larger order today without remembering, and a charity could have benefitted from my purchase. It was automatic for awhile and now the feature doesn't exist.

So they promised me 10$ promotion when I install the app .. once I installed, the promotion is not working. Talking to the customer service (after a lot of pain with the AI thing in the chat), they were not able to handle it. So I'm deleting the order, deleting the app, giving it 1 star (& less if it was possible), and will consider any other online merchant before Amazon from now on! so cheap!!

Love Amazon Prime but the App... I like this app when it works smoothly. Unfortunately this app has constant issues with the shopping cart, which I didn't have before. When I delete one item from my shopping cart it almost always shows that I have no items in my cart. I have to back out of my cart and go back in to see my items. What's worse is that the app also randomly deletes my freaking shopping cart entirely. I have to start over finding the items I had saved. It's very frustrating!

I've been using Amazon for quite sometime, I used to buy the annual pass for prime, 1 and done! I've been building credit and having a small recurring charge is nice to have. so I've decided to lock my credit card which was my main payment on Amazon, but since it was locked they had the audacity to run my debit card? although it is not my primary card and more often then not has to be verified to use for a purchase. feeling a bit violated, to run a card without authorization or decline notice!

This is a great place to do some shopping, as there are a lot of great deals at great prices! If you cannot find what you are looking for, try using other descriptive words in the searches. [**TIP**]: compare similar items AND check the product reviews before buying anything! If you have questions about the product(s), ask. Another plus is the Amazon Prime membership which gives members free shipping (only where it is marked).

I am a new Amazon customer. Not thrilled!! When ordering, they offer free shipping on orders over 25 dollars. Fine. While I was ordering, they upped the free shipping order to 30 dollars. Grrr .... So I found something cheap to order to reach the 30 dollars free shipping. BAIT and SWITCH much, Amazon?.............I like the items that I received. Just the jerky free shipping offer bugged me. I will probably order from Amazon again üòÅ.

I loved this app and would have given it a 4 if they hadn't taken away Amazon Smile capability. If I have to go to the website to do it, I may as well delete the app. I have the website link next to my store icon and because I want to use that service, I've stopped using this app. Please bring it back. Before that gaffe, the only issues I've had is that the app will force close (rarely but inconveniently) and the wish list drag and drop feature disappears from time to time.

New changes almost make the app useless. The app update cuts off descriptions of items rendering the description unusable and also limits the number of items you can see per page to 20. If a search turns up 500 you can only see 20 at a time now, good luck understanding what you are looking at as the description is 90% gone. I used to be happy to shop on Amazon... but now it's just frustrating. I bet Ebay will have what I al looking for.

This is the first time I've ever wanted to revert an app to a previous version. Being able to scroll through my product search without having to constantly click to the next page is what made this app my preferred method of using amazon. With that gone I will most likely use the app less and look elsewhere for products that are easier to browse for.

The app doesnt show the picture when you click on it, then it will crash all the sudden. What good is it if you can't view the pictures. Plus, when you use the average rating filter you can't tell if it opens up because the app makes you scroll down. It's just not designed well. I like Amazon but hate the app.

I can't even use the map anymore an error page pops up every few seconds, it's an extreme sport trying to add items to my cart, view items and cash out. I've been patient for weeks but I'm getting annoyed now sometimes it takes dozens of try just to beat the annoying error page to view an item.

Company Over Customer I find myself reaching for another device or simply searching a different retailer. The search feature limits your results if you choose anything but the featuted sort option. And the choice of brands for filtering is equally limiting. Simply put, a frustrating shopping experience that seems to favor quantity over quality.

Only giving it a 3 because of all the "upgrades" has made the app annoying! Who wants to spend 10 minutes trying to find what you want to search. What happened to basic home goods, outdoors, sporting. Gotta break it all the way down to bobbers. What about browsing through the departments.

Long time Amazon Prime customer & heavy e-commerce lifestyle... If app doesn't change back to continuous scrolling, I will be changing to another platform.... Where I live I can get simalar service from several platforms... App design, easy UI, and speed/comfort to browse/buy are why I loved Amazon... New app update was a huge step backwards. Why parse a consumers browsing?? Not happy....

The worest app and online experience i have ever had. I will not buy from them again. The items I purchaced from them 90% of them didnt arrive while they sending email to rate the item!! the other 5% is damaged. And for the exercise bike i bought was damaged. they replaced to me with another one had worse damage than the old one. and because it is cost over 200$ they just play with refund. they asked me to wait 2 weeks after the end of the period the ask for two weeks more.

the wishlists are all jumbled up. when you set one to the bottom for quick adding, sometimes it puts the items in a completely different list and then have to go back and move things out and to the right one. the online site is great, amazon is great, but the app is having some severe issues

Used this app on regular basis an it worked great. Unfortunately it stopped working around the begining of June 2019. Unistalled and reinstalled still doesn't work. Coincidentally around the same time I developed a problem with Amazon website on in google Chrome on my laptop. Works with Firefox. I don't know if these are Amazon or Google issues.

Recent change included advertisement movies without app setting to opt out. That's too intrusive for a shopping app, at least for my taste. Scrolled page and tapped the movie by accident, then it started playing sound, which is even worse. Bad choice from Amazon to make this change, very annoyed.

No such thing as customer service. I put a few items in my cart weeks ago because I was simply keeping track of them. Yesterday at 4am I received notifications that everything I had in my cart had been purchased by me....and multiple of them. I immediately contacted customer service and the sellers but to no avail. Took my payment options off immediately after and uninstalled the app. Good riddance. 1/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND

Simply horrible. It used to work at least decently. But over the last few months it keeps resetting every time I carry out a search. All this even though I didn't change anything in the setting of my cell. Maybe Amazon is too big to fail, but it certainly seems too big to care about its users' experience.

2 Bugs and a Suggestion/Request Using Samsung Galaxy S10 (Snapdragon) Bugs: ‚Ä¢I'm expirencing an issue with the application remembering the previously used "Wish List" to display in the bottom tray. ‚Ä¢The app has also duplicated items from one wish list into other lists at seemingly random times. Request: ‚Ä¢Please add a dark mode. It would enable a more cohesive experience when using with the S10's native dark mode.

UPDATE: no only can you not click to watch lightning deals through the app, but you also canna view deals you have selected to "watch" from the desktop version of Amazon. way to screw up a great function of an app. can no longer "watch" lightning deals.... says you can but all the deals say prime members only, which is what I am. latest update sucks

This is about Amazon Logistics delivery. I got 2 identical frames to be delivered Saturday. Driver "attempted" to deliver the frames but was unable to. Either no given reason or the "building was closed" which makes no sense at all. So, I called and they said it'll be there by Monday. Lies! As this continued on for 3 days and still no frames! They left an ipad by the front door but not $10 frame? Buying from Walmart would be faster and easier, which defeats the purpose of ordering from Amazon!

The app itself works but the UI is terrible. It feels like I am using a mobile site; very laggy and slow. Amazon should take notes from their Alexa app, which works wonderfully, has beautiful and clean animations, and just overall looks great.

Pretty Bad since update and removal of the Amazon Underground App. The Alexa feature constantly not working saying no connection to server. Search engine is biased to "featured items". Locks up and reboots. Mainly use it only to track the incoming orders while on the go or price comparing while shopping if working at the time.

it's ridiculous the search options on this app and the site. if I put a price range in the search that should be what I come up with. Is so deceiving and irritating to look through something I rather go to Target or Walmart where I know the price won't change once I select an item

it has the worst shopping experience ever, it keeps coming up with about 50 different stupid recommendations as sub categories on a certain category instead of just one full category and then it rarely ever has the option of being able to filter prices or filter it in anyway I want. don't get me wrong it has a large variety of shopping available just the experience is absolutely terrible.

my whole view of Amazon took a bit of a dive. I purchased 3 month gaming pass for a popular colsole which was being sold as 'buy one get one free'. both codes were delivered as promised. what i didnt realise is that the codes were valid only for 3 months , so when it came to redeeming the second code i was advised the 'code had expired. '. meaning ive just paid full wack through a third party. if i wanted to pay full price then i can simply do it on the consoles home screen .

Terrible. Ordered a package and they sent it to the wrong address. Called customer service for the digital code of the game I bought. The guy said he will email me with the code, and never did. Amazon even emailed me about other things. I texted them through the app and they said I ordered it to that address and bought it as a hard copy, even though I ordered it as a digital code to an address a couple states over. Absolutely terrible.

been an Amazon prime customer for years, but with recent updates and changes to the app and shopping experience overall, that may soon change. I rarely utilize the prime video feature so with the shopping becoming a bigger hassle (click next page after only viewing 18 items?!) I might as well save my money.

Why can I no longer filter the way I used to?? I was looking for a pair of inexpensive, comfortable, wide-width shoes. Well, I can't filter for size or width, I can't filter for price, and when I search for "shoes wide fit" and ask to sort by price, low to high, I have to scroll through page after page of non-shoes, and shoes that aren't wide fit. This used to be easy...

Awesome companion app to preview stills and video clips, and it's nice to be able to look at your phone to see what the actual camera is focusing on. Resolution in video playback could be better, and you almost need to export your video or somehow save it locally to your phone to be able to view the videos better.

Worked great at first. I didnt have ANY of these problems till the app updated. The app would constantly freeze and close. Also wouldnt save items to the right lists or open my lists at all. Some items i bought still have yet to arrive yet were expected about a month ago. Please fix!

I have made numerous attempts at contacting amazon. Simply to verify the correct address. Order being late doesnt matter but the multiple failures to speak with anyone who spoke english and the continued inability to correct information displayed by amazon is beyond ridiculous. If I wish to "chat" with customer service, I'm forced to download an app, which I do NOT want, as it is LOADED with seriously unnecessary and undesired features. I should not have to turn them off! They shouldnt be there

this app has everything you can think of buying except firearms. the only problem with this app is when you create a list and try to drag your desired item into that list and it ends up in the very first list you created and everything else you saved. and when you start up the app and your list won't show up sometimes

I love amazon but lately ive had SOOO many packages delayed, damaged, lost and have had to be refunded. yeah it happens from time to time, but this has been so many times now, I've called so many times about my orders and it is literally so frustrating to deal with costumer service. I chose one day delivery and it literally takes two or more. Yeah its first world problem but I would like to get my moneys worth of paying for prime. Amazon's quality has gone darastically down shipment wise.

This used to be a great app. But lately, it constantly has issues showing stock options once you even find the product you desire. I love dogs as much as the next person, but if I have to see one more cute pup telling me that something went wrong just before the app stops working...ARGH!!!!

long page load times, along with the inability to see all search results...just what will fit on Amazon's predetermined page size...prevent this from standing out. I'm pretty certain Amazon has the capital to fix it, but it doesn't seem to be a priority

New update is horrible. Just horrible. Slow, freezes, glitchy. And adding things like the "shopping list" at the bottom? Why? Just provide us with a no frills option to shop. We enter a search term, you provide the results.

it was good up into the last few orders. it started charging me multiple times for the same outfits that I ordered one time. if I hadn't gone back and looked at my orders, I would have been paying for two of the same outfits. this needs to be fixed asap.
the app is somewhat easy to use BUT if you have wish lists that you like to organize good luck. it keeps changing the folder and the app keeps crashing on me. getting pretty damn annoyed.

1 star because every time I go to edit my cart the app fails. All of the items disappear and I get a message that my shopping cart is empty. Makes it pretty difficult, if not impossible to use at best.

amazon is my favorite app to shop on, it's easy to use and it doesn't break the bank. If you don't want to buy anything just yet you can just look at stuff for fun, the reason it isn't a 5 star is because if you use the app on a smart phone it glitchs alot and takes forever to load, I use my laptop when going on amazon. Its so much faster and not as many glitchs

I didn't have an issue with this app before, with the new update you can't see items in a list view like before, making shopping a little annoying as I have to scroll more.and waste time trying to find the item I want. Please give us the option of viewing items in list view again!

update: Now everything is working again. Thanks. older review: On this app, Today's Deal lightning deals no longer has its "Watch this deal","Search Filter", "sort option" function on any of its upcoming deals. The "Watching" tab has nothing there on this app even if I added many watch items from my laptop Amazon account online. Was working fine before, but not now. Uninstall and reinstall but no fix. Is it only me? This was my go to shopping app.

On June the 3rd I purchased a makeup mirror and a brush set. I waited all day on the day it was to arrive and the UPS never showed. I called Amazon the next morning only for them to tell me that my card declined and they wouldn't do anything to fix it. So I called my bank because I was looking at my online purchases and my bank confirmed that yes the order was taken off my card. So probably won't be ordering from Amazon any longer and will tell everyone I know every chance I get about this.

love using amazon the only issue I have is the wish list for some reason I set up a different one it works shortly then it switches back to the original one and doesn't always show what I drag into the list quite annoying.

The App works fine, the problem is Amazon i have had an account for years however i recently tried to update my payment method with new card details and it said the card was not supported even though it was from popular banks companies. On reporting this to the help team they were very dismissive and ended the chat saying the problem was resolved when it still isnt.

Stupidest App in Playstore, Cannot select my country 'U.A.E' as the option isn't present in change country list. Same app when installed in different phone which i do not use shows the option. Some how the stupid developers have borrowed info from ROM installed and shows you only the relevant country. How Stupid can you be? As if nobody can/will buy phones from different region or perhaps people who come w/ visit visa will not shop on amazon. Missing Souq app which was much better.

Good but mediocre performance. App load stuff slow. Takes 3 to 6 seconds to fully load an item or when going to certain sections within the app. Facebook and Instagram even faster in loading things at most 1 to 2 seconds.

Doesn't work. Since the last update, the app won't load. I've uninstalled, reinstalled, cleared all my cache and data, nothing works. I now have to log on to my computer to order anything. Very frustrating. FIX THIS

A package was not delivered to where it should have been, despite directions stating to leave it in a certain location. Customer service stated they would credit me the order plus $5 for the inconvenience. I did not get the $5 for the inconvenience. I called customer service to see why and the lady was too dumb to understand what I was saying. Amazon customer service sucks. That is why I will not purchase a prime membership.
The latest update makes the app function the same way the mobile site does‚Äîit's clunky, annoying, and filtering results takes FOREVER. I have no idea why they went backwards with this.

Search became tiresome with the latest update. Amazon is my favorite e-commerce website. But the latest update screwing my experience. It's so annoying to keep pressing NEXT to see more products in the same criteria and going back is even worse. Need to press BACK many times to be able to see last visited category. Please correct this soon.

too many items come defective: the return options are too time consuming to make it worth my while. i have to do an hour of work to return a $10 item that was arrived defective. the savings arent worth the hastle. i may continue to use amazon for large items but i will shop elsewhere for anything under $100.

I cant even use this app anymore. It keeps telling me to update then when I do it tells me to update again or follow a link to install. I click install to see if it's the same app and it feeds me back into the same loop. Extremely frustrating. Why wouldn't I just go visit your site on a web browser.

What happened!!! You took away any way to sort through the deals!!! I dont even look at that mess of deals due to the complete randomness. If by chance yu do find an upcoming deal what happened to the watch button. You would think those things are grest sales tools. Please Fix i was happy with the old version.

The best online shopping app hands down. The interface is easy to use/navigate. The products pop up w/ no issues no matter if you're on Wifi or a mobile network. The Amazon app is my favorite shopping app hands down.
